body.p: The IFRS restricts the use of fair value as deemed cost to those assets for which reconstructing costs is likely to be of limited benefit to users and particularly onerous: property, plant and equipment, investment property (if an entity elects to use the cost method in IAS 40 Investment Property) and intangible assets that meet restrictive criteria (paragraphs D5 and D7 of the IFRS).
